moves.name: Dire Hit All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Sunny Side Up!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed of all allied sync pairs. Sharply raises them if the weather is sunny.

moves.name: Light Screen
